name: The Sun Is Off
description:
Submission for the LOWREZJAM 2020 game jam

Source on github: https://github.com/vix597/thesunisoff

Two-handed keyboard controls:

  • W, A, S, D (or arrow keys) - To move around
  • Space bar - To attack with your sword and to advance dialog
  • Escape - to pause and save or exit
  •  J - Cast spell (uses a small amount of magic which refills over time)
  • K - Cast 360 spell (uses a lot of the magic bar)
  • L - Use/throw the equipped potion
  • Tab - Cycle through potions
  • E - Interact (open doors, chests, talk to NPCs, etc.)
  • Shift + L  - Throw potion behind you
  • 8 - Equip health potion if you have any
  • 9 - Equip fire potion if you have any
  • 0 - Equip ice potion if you have any

One-handed keyboard controls:

  • W, A, S, D (or arrow keys) - To move around
  • Space bar - To attack with your sword and to advance dialog
  • Escape - to pause and save or exit
  • Q - Cast spell (uses a small amount of magic which refills over time)
  • F  - Cast 360 spell (uses a lot of the magic bar)
  • G - Use/throw the equipped potion
  • Tab - Cycle through potions
  • E - Interact (open doors, chests, talk to NPCs, etc.)
  • Shift + G - Throw potion behind you
  • 1 - Equip health potion if you have any
  • 2 - Equip fire potion if you have any
  • 3 - Equip ice potion if you have any

Additional controls:

  • Left click - Sword attack
  • Right click - Magic 360 attack
  • I - Display your inventory (coins, potions, amulets)
  • U - Display your stats (kills, deaths, health, damage, etc.)

XBox controls:

  • Left thumb stick  - Movement
  • XBox A - Interact
  • XBox X - Magic Punch
  • XBox Y - 360 Magic
  • XBox B - Sword attack
  • Right trigger - Use/throw potion
  • Left trigger + Right trigger - Use/Throw potion behind you
  • Left shoulder button - Previous potion
  • Right shoulder button - Next potio
